original_text: The waters returned and covered the chariots and the horsemen; of all the host of Pharaoh that had followed them into the sea, not one of them remained.
korean_text: 물이 다시 흘러 병거들과 기병들을 덮되 그들의 뒤를 따라 바다에 들어간 바로의 군대를 다 덮으니 하나도 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: and covered the chariots and the horsemen
of all the host of Pharaoh
that had followed them into the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그들�� 바다로 따라 들어간 자들 가운데
